id: scenario-value-scanner-senior-scenarios-family-planning for margaret's own future care needs
title: Planning for Margaret's own future care needs
description: Planning for Margaret's own future care needs
content:
Scenario: Planning for Margaret's own future care needs
    Given Margaret is providing care now but will need care eventually
    And she's watching her mother's care requirements
    When the family_elohim facilitates future care planning
    Then Margaret's current care contributions should build future care security
    And family should understand reciprocal care obligations
    And Margaret's care tokens should represent future care resources
    And conversations about her eventual needs should be normalized
    And family should prepare for role reversal
    And Margaret should have agency in planning her own future care
